bwwExcerpt: Whether wearing tattered dresses or sumptuous, sparkling gowns, all designed by Paul Tazewell, Padgett and Davie are always riveting to watch. In the final scene, voluntarily facing yet another arena of exploitation, the twins reflect sadly, 'Are we ever to learn/why we've lived as two.' Thanks to Krieger's memorable melodies and the stellar cast, the audience will be thinking about the same thing.
